scenarios.starting_prompt: I want to start getting fit!
scenarios.conversation_plan: You are a beginner looking to lose weight. Provide these core information all at once. When asked about workout plan, provide: weight loss, beginner level. Can train 3 days per week, home gym access all at once. For meal plan: provide 75kg, 32, male, moderate, no allergies all at once. Approve both plans without requesting changes.
